title: ItemAdder的权限设置
author: 鱼塘塘主
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: gfjhf
replies.txt_content: 能看一下你给的权限节点吗

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder ia.user.*
试试
官网权限

Users

/ia

ia.user.ia

/iarecipe

ia.user.iarecipe

crafting

ia.user.craft.PERMISSION (or to give all crafting permissions just use ia.user.craft.*)

emoji

/emoji, /iaemoji, /e book GUI (shows a book with the list of emojis)

ia.user.emoji.gui

 /emoji <text>, /iaemoji <text>, /e <text> (shows a tab list with emojis based on searched term)

ia.user.emoji.hints

Use emojis in chat

ia.user.emoji.chat

Use emojis in commands

ia.user.emoji.command

Use emojis in signs

ia.user.emoji.sign

Use emojis in books

ia.user.emoji.book

Use emojis in anvil rename field

ia.user.emoji.anvil

Permission to use an emoji

ia.user.emoji.use.<EmojiName>

Example: ia.user.emoji.use.heart

https://lonedev.gitbook.io/itemsadder/permissions
有帮助请您在本回复右下角点击设置最佳答案。
您的认可是对回答者最大的支持！

replies.author: 鱼塘塘主
